alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Kingsbury; Lake; Miner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 9:34PM MDT until September 08 at 10:15PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Kingsbury County in east central South Dakota... Northwestern Lake County in east central South Dakota... Northeastern Miner County in east central South Dakota... Southwestern Brookings County in east central South Dakota... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1034 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carthage, or 10 miles southwest of Lake Thompson State Recreation Area, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... De Smet around 1045 PM CDT. Lake Thompson State Recreation Area around 1050 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lake Preston, Oldham, Hetland, Arlington and Badger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
